```{r my_cars, include = FALSE}
cars %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = speed) +
  aes(y = dist) + #BREAK
  geom_point(
             shape = 21,
             size = 7, #BREAK2
             color = "magenta", #BREAK3
             alpha = .8 #BREAK4

  aes(fill = speed) + 
  scale_fill_viridis_c() + 
  theme_minimal() #BREAK
```
